page.title: 13PARISH CHURCH
page.content: St. Paul's Church has{two Sunday {services,}9.30a.m.and 6.30p.m. in summer/4p.m. in winter. There is an 8a.m. service on the first Sunday of every month.{Averages-attendance 110, {communicants 75, Sunday School 40. Daily services two, morning and evening. Records May 1984/May 1985-{15 {christenings, 6 marriages, 36 funerals Church Clubs-Crossbearers and Youth Club for seniors and juniors, separate from village youth club. Vicar has held living for five years. New vicarage is 3.1/2 years old. The {steeple, the tallest in the area,}was struck by{lightning}in 1983 and had to be repaired. Church cleaning and flower arranging are done each week voluntarily by ladies by rota. School services held in church - Harvest Festival, Christmas, Ascension Day, Leavers' Service.
